resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106511</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106511</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202805</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Australian Travel Adventure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Australisches Spielraum-Abenteuer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Aventure Australienne de Voyage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aventura Australian Do Curso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Avventura Australiana Di Corsa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυστραλιανή περιπέτεια ταξιδιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aventura Australiana Del Recorrido</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will learn information about each of Australia's states and territories by researching information from Internet sites. They will then take what they have learned and decorate the outline of a car with symbols and pictures that represent information gained from their research.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer erlernen Informationen über jede 
von Zuständen und von Gegenden Australiens, indem sie Informationen 
von den Internet-Sites erforschen. Sie dann nehmen, was sie 
erlernt haben und verzieren die umreiß eines Autos mit Symbolen und 
Abbildungen, die die Informationen darstellen, die von ihrer Forschung
gewonnen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants apprendront des informations sur 
chacun des états et des territoires de l'Australie en recherchant 
l'information des sites Internet. Ils alors prendront ce qu'ils 
ont appris et décoreront le contour d'une voiture avec les symboles 
et les images qui représentent l'information obtenue de leur 
recherche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes aprenderão a informação sobre 
cada um de estados e de territórios de Austrália pesquisando a 
informação dos locais de Internet. Então farão exame de o 
que aprenderam e decorarão o esboço de um carro com símbolos e 
retratos que representam a informação ganha de sua pesquisa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi impareranno che le informazioni su 
ciascuna dell'Australia dichiarano e territori ricercando le 
informazioni dai luoghi di Internet. Allora prenderanno che cosa
hanno imparato e decoreranno il profilo di un automobile con i simboli
e le immagini che rappresentano le informazioni ottenute dalla loro 
ricerca.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα μάθουν τις πληροφορίες για κάθε ένα 
από τα κράτη και τα εδάφη της Αυστραλίας με την έρευνα των 
πληροφοριών από τους χώρους διαδικτύου. Θα πάρουν έπειτα 
τι έχουν μάθει και διακοσμούν το περίγραμμα ενός αυτοκινήτου με 
τα σύμβολα και τις εικόνες που αντιπροσωπεύουν τις πληροφορίες που
λαμβάνονται από την έρευνά τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes aprenderán la información sobre 
cada uno de los estados y de los territorios de Australia investigando
la información de sitios de Internet. Después tomarán lo que 
han aprendido y adornarán el contorno de un coche con los símbolos y
los cuadros que representan la información ganada de su 
investigación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:COURTNEY FLYNT
FN:COURTNEY FLYNT
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202805</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106511</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/australian-travel-adventure</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
